steps.name: search the new client via api using phone
assert via api that the client has been created by comparing name and address

assertThat 'ClientCreateRequest(is_filling_up_sent=false, status=oedq2QbK1p, permitAds=true, birthdate=09-06, birthyear=1972, address=844 O'Conner Circle, West Latia, DE 01991, debts=[{"date":"2023-04-28 16:29:25","desc":"NDkzze34Yl","sum":1371524980}], phone=["0509-99-73-54"], email=wayne.stokes@hotmail.com, notes=[{"added":"2023-04-28 16:29:23","text":"gfpezeeek_"}], name=Mrs. Lance Gaylord, gender=null)'

usingRecursiveComparison '- no overridden equals methods were used in the comparison (except for java types)
- these types were compared with the following comparators:
  - java.lang.Double -> DoubleComparator[precision=1.0E-15]
  - java.lang.Float -> FloatComparator[precision=1.0E-6]
  - java.nio.file.Path -> lexicographic comparator (Path natural order)
- actual and expected objects and their fields were compared field by field recursively even if they were not of the same type, this allows for example to compare a Person to a PersonDto (call strictTypeChecking(true) to change that behavior).
'

assertThat 'ClientCreateRequest(is_filling_up_sent=false, status=oedq2QbK1p, permitAds=true, birthdate=09-06, birthyear=1972, address=844 O'Conner Circle, West Latia, DE 01991, debts=[{"date":"2023-04-28 16:29:25","desc":"NDkzze34Yl","sum":1371524980}], phone=["0509-99-73-54"], email=wayne.stokes@hotmail.com, notes=[{"added":"2023-04-28 16:29:23","text":"gfpezeeek_"}], name=Mrs. Lance Gaylord, gender=null)'

isEqualTo 'ClientGetResponse(id=2971, name=Mrs. Lance Gaylord, phone=0509997354, profileImage=client_photo-Th_z.jpg, address=844 O'Conner Circle, West Latia, DE 01991, status=[{"added":"2023-04-28 16:29:23","text":"gfpezeeek_"}], permitAds=false, isUnsubscribed=false, lastAppointment=null, phoneCanonical=+972509997354)'
